passive.name: DIVINE ASCENT
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DIVINE ASCENT
                                Kayle ascends as she gains levels. Level 1: Attack grants 4% Attack Speed (4% + 1% ) for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Gains 8% Movement Speed at max stacks. Passive hit bonus magic damage 12 (12/15/18/21 + 15% )Level 5: Attack range is increased to 525.Level 9: Attacks fire waves of flame at max stacks, dealing passive damage of Starfire Spellblade.Level 13: Attack range is increased to 575. The bonus from reaching max stacks becomes permanent.

q.name: (Q) RADIANT BLAST
q.description:
(Q) RADIANT BLAST
 11/10/9/8s   80/85/90/95 
                                
                                
                                Launches a celestial sword, dealing 70 magic damage (70/120/170/220 + 60% bonus  + 50% ). Enemies hit are slowed by 26% for 2 seconds and their armor and magic resist is reduced by 20% for 4 seconds.

w.name: (W) CELESTIAL BLESSING
w.description:
(W) CELESTIAL BLESSING
 14s   85/90 /95/100 
                                
                                
                                Heals herself and an allied champion for 65 (65/105/145/185 + 40% ) and grant them 25% Movement Speed (25/30/35/40% + 8% per 100 ) for 2 seconds.

e.name: (E) STARFIRE SPELLBLADE
e.description:
(E) STARFIRE SPELLBLADE
 8/7,5/7/6,5s  
                                
                                
                                Passive: Attacks deal bonus 12 magic damage (12/15/18/21 + 10% bonus  + 15% ).Active: Empowers her next attack to become ranged and deal bonus magic damage equal to 8% (8/9/10/11% + 2% per 100 ) of the targets' missing health.When Kayle reaches level 10, Starfire Spellblade affects all nearby enemies.Deal 60% damage to monsters.
notes: ranged and deal bonus magic damage equal to 8% (8/9/10/11% + 2% per 100 ) of the targets' missing health

r.name: (R) DIVINE JUDGMENT
r.description:
(R) DIVINE JUDGMENT
 100/90/80s   100/50/0 
                                
                                
                                Grants Invulnerability to an allied champion for 2.5 seconds.Blades rain down around the target, dealing 150 magic damage (150/275/400 + 100% bonus  + 80% ).

situational_items_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
situational_items_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.

runes_detailed.description: Gain tenacity for each Legend stack (max 10 stacks). Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, and minion kill.

runes_detailed.name: Coup de Grace
runes_detailed.description: Rune effect for Coup de Grace
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
